  • Classes in org.neo4j.kernel.recovery used by org.neo4j.kernel.recovery 
    Class Description
    CorruptedLogsTruncator
    Transaction log truncator used during recovery to truncate all the logs after some specified position, that recovery treats as corrupted or non-readable.
    LogTailScannerMonitor  
    RecoveryApplier
    Recovery transaction applier that will apply all recovered transaction to underlying store.
    RecoveryFacade  
    RecoveryMonitor  
    RecoveryService  
    RecoveryStartInformation  
    RecoveryStartInformationProvider
    Utility class to find the log position to start recovery from
    RecoveryStartInformationProvider.Monitor  
    RecoveryStartupChecker  
    TransactionLogsRecovery
    This is the process of doing a recovery on the transaction log and store, and is executed at startup of Database.
